item.title: Inspection and Sanitisation Guidance
item.description: In this session, we’ll look at the ISGs published by the NSA. These are standards established by the NSA. There is a ISG for each file type. https://nsacyber.github.io/publications.html ISG for PDF WHY (…) What (…) Outcomes (…) References (…) Previous–>
